Nogrod}}: Dwarvish]] name for [[Nogrod]], the citadel of the [[Dwarves]] that lay in the central part of the [[Blue Mountains]], near [[Mount Dolmed]].

column4: Appendix}}(entry for ''groth'')</ref> [[Magnus Åberg]] has suggested that the name consists of the unattested elements ''tûm'' (?"bold/delving") and ''[[zahar]]'' (?"hollow").<ref>[[Magnus Åberg]], "[http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/md_khuzdul.pdf An analysis of Dwarvish]" at [http://www.forodrim.org/index_en.html Forodrim.org] (accessed 5 November 2011)</ref>
